txt.en: 'Hold on. Before we head in, I've got a favour to ask.\n\n'There are a few Orcs locked up in cages there. I stole the key; 'course, I can't be seen freeing them. Though... it wouldn't be a problem for you, would it? Free a few more prisoners, and the Quartermaster will be sure to tell us where Dhúrstrok is.'
'Thanks for that. I wasn't about to leave Gundabad without them.\n\n'They'll know where to go to avoid trouble.'
You have freed the Orcs.\n\nShúkurz is waiting for you by the southern entrance to Vatug-ronk.
'Wha -- never mind, let's get outta here!'
'Don't think this makes us owe you, [placeholder]!'
'Thanks for that. They'll know where to go to avoid trouble.'
Shúkurz has asked you to free a few imprisoned Orcs.\n\nTheir cages can be found around Vatug-ronk.

'The Quartermaster's one of the few who know where Dhúrstrok is. He can't be happy now that the dwarf smiths have escaped and the weapons shipment has gotten delayed... which means [placeholder] here is in big trouble with him.

'Maybe... maybe we could go to him. I could bring [placeholder], pretend that I captured them and want a reward from Gorgar. We'll find out where Dhúrstrok is, you'll get what you want, and I'll be out of Gundabad.'

Before Náin can get a word in, Féli nods in approval. Shúkurz turns to you, his posture just a little straighter than before despite his nervous expression.

'We'll be heading west to Vatug-ronk at the bottom of Deepscrave. Nasty place, full of nastier folks. Meet me by the southern entrance, and I'll bring you to the Quartermaster.'
Shúkurz will meet you by the southern entrance of Vatug-ronk.\n\nVatug-ronk is located on the lowest level of Deepscrave, to the west of Aslíf.
Shúkurz has agreed to help the Gabil'akkâ.
